summary: A collection of helper modules that set up and control the auxiliary services required for Certbot integration tests, such as a local ACME server, DNS server, HTTP proxy, OCSP responder, and Certbot execution environment, along with miscellaneous cryptographic and networking utilities.
business_intent: Enable reliable, isolated, and parallelizable automated testing of the Certbot client by providing ready‑to‑use test infrastructure components and convenience functions for launching and managing those components.
